reuters.title: WINN ENTERPRISES <WNN> UNIT SELLS DAIRY
reuters.body: Winn Enterprises' Knudsen Foods Inc said it entered an agreement to sell its Hawaiian dairy operations to Foremost Foods Inc for 13 mln dlrs cash. The company said the purchase price is subject to adjustment and the entire transaction is subject to approval by the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the Central District of California. Reuter 
